Name: Velvet Old Fashioned
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The use of a good Pedro Ximénez sherry and achieving the correct level of dilution is key to the success of this potentially brilliant cocktail.
History: History of the Old-Fashioned cocktail and more variations on the Old-Fashioned .
Nutrition: One serving of Velvet Old Fashioned contains 168 calories
